alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:13PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tehama and southeastern Shasta Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 412 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shingletown, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shingletown, Whitmore, Inwood and Manton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
